backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing three ContactPage visual update requirements and associated files/components/tests.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of autogenerated short summaries for many frontend files covering styling, components, pages, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH design tokens, dark mode variables, and global background/foreground rules.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML entry with SEO metadata, Google Fonts preconnects, and root mount point.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root app component registering routes and rendering pages inside AppLayout with an ErrorBoundary.
frontend/src/components/about/DividerFea: Renders a list of features separated by dividers with title and description styling.
frontend/src/components/about/TeamMember: Displays a team member row with optional reversed layout and placeholder image area.
frontend/src/components/common/NumberTic: Animated number ticker using IntersectionObserver to trigger counting when visible.
frontend/src/components/common/PageTrans: Wraps children with fade or fade‑slide page transition respecting reduced‑motion settings.
frontend/src/components/common/RevealOnS: Scroll‑reveal wrapper that animates elements into view with optional delay and reduced‑motion bypass.
frontend/src/components/contact/ServiceS: A dropdown accordion for selecting a legal service, with validation styling and dynamic option list.
frontend/src/components/ErrorBoundary.ts: React error boundary showing a styled fallback card with error details and reload button.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer component with contact info, social links, and smooth-scrolling quick links handling homepage vs other-page navigation.
frontend/src/components/home/AboutApproa: Renders the firm's overview and approach details with icons and a button that navigates to the About page.
Displays an interactive FAQ accordion and embeds JSON-LD structured FAQ data for SEO.
frontend/src/components/home/FinalCtaSec: A call-to-action section prompting users to schedule a consultation, navigating to the contact page.
frontend/src/components/home/HeroSection: A hero banner with an auto-advancing background image carousel and a consultation navigation button.
A responsive navbar with scroll detection, section navigation, and mobile menu toggling.
frontend/src/components/home/HowItWorksS: A timeline-based section explaining the firm's legal process steps.
frontend/src/components/home/PartnersMar: Renders a looping marquee of partner cards, duplicating the list for seamless scrolling.
frontend/src/components/home/PartnersSec: Displays a partners section with a header and passes a static partner list to the marquee component.
frontend/src/components/home/ServicesSec: Shows a grid of legal services with icons and includes navigation buttons for exploring more or contacting.
frontend/src/components/home/Testimonial: Implements an auto-scrolling testimonials carousel with manual navigation and responsive layout.
Wraps the testimonials carousel with section styling and a header using predefined testimonial data.
frontend/src/components/home/TrustIntroS: Presents animated trust indicators with icons and number tickers highlighting firm achievements.
frontend/src/components/layout/AppLayout: Defines the app layout with navbar, page transition wrapper, and scroll restoration on route changes.
frontend/src/components/reui/timeline.ts: Provides a wrapper implementation of timeline components with context, orientation handling, and styled subcomponents.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor using React Query, updating when Internet Identity changes and invalidating dependent queries.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a React context and provider for managing Internet Identity authentication using AuthClient, including login state and stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useNumberTicker.ts: Implements an animated number counter that ticks from 0 to a target when visible using requestAnimationFrame.
frontend/src/hooks/usePreloadImages.ts: Preloads an array of images and returns loading progress along with flags for first and all images being ready.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Simple wrapper exposing actor and fetching state from useActor as a placeholder for future query hooks.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines global styles, Tailwind layers, color variables for light/dark themes, typography, and utility classes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point setting up React Query and Internet Identity providers before rendering the App component.
frontend/src/pages/AboutPage.tsx: Renders the About page with values, team members, features, and navigation actions using animated sections.
frontend/src/pages/ContactPage.tsx: Implements a contact form with validation, submission simulation, service selection, and a styled hero section.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Composes the homepage using multiple feature sections with scroll-reveal animations and a footer.
frontend/src/pages/NotFoundPage.tsx: Displays a 404 page with an error message and a button to navigate back to the homepage.
frontend/src/pages/servicesData.ts: Exports a list of service definitions with names, icons, and descriptions for rendering on the Services page.
frontend/src/pages/ServicesPage.tsx: Renders the Services page with a hero section, practice areas grid from servicesData, and a CTA, using RevealOnScroll and navigation to contact.
frontend/src/router/router.ts: Implements a simple custom client-side router with route registration, navigation, and a subscription system for updates.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, fonts, animations, and plugin integrations for the project.
project_state.json: Describes project state and requirements for applying a background image with a dark overlay on the Contact page hero section.
